name: bloodstone cairn
description:
bloodstone cairn is a story about May, about the woods, and about RESETs.

it is largely inspired by a game my friends and I used to play, and by a piece of work I read in cicada magazine.

I hope you enjoy it.

trigger warnings: blood (mention), bones (mention), non-human transformation (mild description), death (implied), unreality

Please contact me if there are any triggers that you'd like added.

~ Nevermore Quill
